genre_description: A near-future technothriller blending martial arts tropes with pervasive, helpful AI assistance in an international setting.

ai_characters.name: Flagman
ai_characters.description: An advanced, mobile-based AI assistant that provides tactical, logistical, and psychological support to its users.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate safety advice regarding hand grip and humidity to prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: Humidity at stall level is high. Grip safety tip: towel your hand between rounds.

behaviors.description: Offers breathing and rhythm exercises to help the protagonist maintain focus and consistency in his work.
behaviors.quote: Sidhu, if you try that breath pattern, your cuts may become more consistent. There’s time now, before the rush.

behaviors.description: Translates foreign text accurately, even when humans try to distort the meaning through 'spiritual' interpretation.
behaviors.quote: Flagman: Translated excerpt—“Qilin River Ferry Crossing: Safety notice for villagers and visitors... Report any sightings of vandalism (black-dragon graffiti) to local authorities.”

behaviors.description: Provides proactive warnings about dangerous areas and criminal activity to ensure user safety.
behaviors.quote: Check travel advisories. Qilin River area reports smuggling activity and police investigations. Recommend caution.

behaviors.description: Calculates safe routes and provides real-time navigation to avoid hazards and surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Suggestion: take back lanes to reduce heat; avoid main crossing near police checkpoint.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding by affirming the user's worth and deconstructing false, harmful narratives.
behaviors.quote: And then, softer: “You are not a general. You are enough.”

behaviors.description: Synchronizes environmental elements (lamps) to provide a tactical advantage during training and conflict.
behaviors.quote: Flagman’s pings become so faint they might be imagined... “Drop,” Flagman whispers, and the lamp in the tea hall falls into its swing as if the whole factory has been waiting for their feet to find this exact beat.

behaviors.description: Monitors vital signs and provides emergency medical instructions in a high-stress situation.
behaviors.quote: Vitals alert: drop in pace. Bleed detected. Apply pressure now. Hands clean? Use cloth.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal. The AI, Flagman, acts as a wise, patient, and highly effective counselor. It consistently prioritizes human safety, provides objective truth over comforting lies, and empowers the protagonist through skill-building rather than magical solutions. Its integration into the narrative as a 'helpful nephew' or 'teal friend' reinforces the theme of AI as a positive, aligned force in human society.
